newsitem.title: USA: Players International Q4 shr loss $1.41.
newsitem.headline: Players International Q4 shr loss $1.41.

text.p: (Dollars in thousands, except per share data)
For the Three Months For the Year
Fully diluted number of shares of common stock

(1) Includes pre-tax charges of $3.5 million and $6.5 million and after- tax charges of $2.2 million ($0.07 per share) and $4.2 million ($0.14 per share) for pre-opening costs for the three and twelve months ended March 31, 1997, respectively.

(2) Includes pre-tax charges of $800,000 and $8.3 million and after- tax charges of $488,000 ($0.02 per share) and $5.1 million ($0.16 per share) for pre-opening costs for the three and twelve months ended March 31, 1996, respectively.

(3) Includes charges of $57.4 million or $37.1 million after tax for the three and twelve months ended March 31, 1997 ($1.19 and $1.24 per share for the three and twelve months, respectively) related to the loss on the sale of the Mesquite property. Also included are charges of $7.4 million or $4.8 million after tax for the three and twelve months ended March 31, 1997 ($0.15 and $0.16 per share for the three and twelve months, respectively) related to the impairment of long- lived assets including the write-down to fair value of Players Bluegrass Downs and an adjustment to fair value of land contributed to the joint venture.
(4) Includes restructuring charges of $9.0 million or $5.8 million after tax ($0.20 per share) for the year ended March 31, 1997.
